thread.title: UK's Johnson says spy poisoning 'signature' act by Russian state

title: UK's Johnson says spy poisoning 'signature' act by Russian state
text:
UK's Johnson says spy poisoning 'signature' act by Russian state 9:05am EDT - 01:04 
Speaking to the BBC, UK foreign minister Boris Johnson said the poisoning of a former Russian spy with a Soviet-era nerve agent was a 'signature' act by the Russian state. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Speaking to the BBC, UK foreign minister Boris Johnson said the poisoning of a former Russian spy with a Soviet-era nerve agent was a 'signature' act by the Russian state. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2pg2mh0
